ai_headline_morning: Good morning ☀️ — we gathered the best deals for you.
ai_headline_day: How are you? 😊 We found today’s best picks for you.
ai_headline_evening: Good evening 🌆 — fresh deals are waiting for you.
ai_headline_night: Good night 🌙 — we’re preparing tomorrow’s picks.
about_text: FindAllEasy is an AI-powered global price comparison platform. It unites online stores worldwide to find the best price for you. Just type — we handle the rest.
